sentences.sContent: The new salesgirl was read out of the shop.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new salesgirl was read out of the shop.
sentences.sCn: 新来的女售货员从商店开除了。

sentences.sContent: The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.
sentences.sContent_eng: The manager reproached the new salesgirl for her carelessness.
sentences.sCn: 经理斥责新来的女售货员工作上粗心大意。

trans.tranOther: a young woman who sells things in a shop
